spell.name: Healer's Intuition
entries: You call upon your dragonmark's power to better mend wounds. When you Cast the Spell, you can Recall Knowledge (Medicine), Administer First Aid, Battle Medicine, Treat Disease, Treat Poison, or Treat Wounds. You gain a +1 status bonus to the skill used for the roll, and this bonus remains as long as you Sustain the Spell.

3: You do not need to sustain Healer's Intuition

spell.name: Lesser Healer

frequency.entry: Once per day --- even if you have the focus point to cast it

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. When you begin to cast Lesser Healer, you choose to replicate  Endure, Soothe, Restoration, Remove Paralysis, or Restore Senses. Lesser Healer gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Lesser Healer.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.

items: {@b Greater Dragonmark} You may cast Lesser Healer up to two times per daily preparation.
{@b Grand Dragonmark} You may cast Lesser Healer up to three times per daily preparation.
{@b Siberys Dragonmark} You may cast Lesser Healer any number of times per daily preparation.
